dt-example.title: Add a custom title to a pane
dt-example.info:
This is the searchPanes extension for DataTables. It allows results to be filtered based on the values of columns.
This example shows the behaviour of SearchPanes when a header is used, which has a length longer than the width of the search bar. In this case an ellipsis will be appended.
Note: The header has to be made this abstract in order to trigger the behaviour!
